meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Sulfur</kanji> that's <kanji>yellow</kanji> is still <vocabulary>sulfur</vocabulary>. It smells like rotten eggs, which are also kinda yellow.
readingMnemonic:
The reading for this word is an exception. Here's a mnemonic to help you remember it:

This <vocabulary>sulfur</vocabulary> smells like an <reading>ea</reading>gle's <reading>OOHHH</reading> (いおう)!! Oh no. Sulfur smells... it smells... like an eagle's... OH.. Oh eww no.
